text:
See the JSP 1.2 Specification, version 10.5.9 (which contains the Javadocs for
the VariableInfo class):

  "The class name (VariableInfo.getClassName) in the returned objects
  are used to determine the types of the scripting variables.  Because
  of this, a custom action cannot create a scripting variable of a
  primitive type.  The workaround is to use "boxed" types."

Thus, what you are trying to do is not allowed.
